name: Fancade
description:
Play more than 50 games and 1,000 levels in a quest to collect stars and unlock worlds. Then visit the arcade to play new games every day! Or make your own?
Hi! I'm Martin, I made Fancade for you. Here's why I think you might like it:
- Simple fun games
- New stuff every day
- Make your own games
- Play offline
- Play for free
All Fancade games are made with the app itself. Any player can become a creator. And many have, that's how we can have new games every day!
Kindly,
Martin Magni
